basicInfo.desc: This task pivots an RWD Grid and serializes the partial results.

parameter.name: params
parameter.desc: The JSON containing parameters plus delta

parameter.name: messageID
parameter.desc: The Message ID of a previously executed Report Writer Document.

parameter.name: suppressData
parameter.desc: Indicates that no data shall be returned to the caller

parameter.name: disablePU
parameter.desc: Indicates that parrtial update shall be disabled
